entry.content:
We have a requirement to obtain a complete list of all Work Packages from Customer Projects including the Blocked Functions field. Which CDS View or API can we use?

entry.title: S4 Public Cloud 0L vs 4G configuration
entry.content:
咨询使用0L 和4G 的区别，可否使用 0L做经典外汇评估，用4G 做高级外汇评估？

实施伙伴可以保存这样的配置方案，希望确认是否可以这样配置。

S/4AHAN Public Cloud 3SL客户希望用经典外汇评估方法，伙伴已经启用了4G ，而4G 必须做高级配置，因此伙伴有了这个配置思路 – 既满足客户需要，又满足启用4G必须高级配置的要求。

Seek expert guidance about 0L vs 4G.

Can we use 0L for Classic Advanced Foreign Exchange Evaluation and 4G for Advanced Foreign Exchange Evaluation?

Our partner can save such a configuration scheme and want to confirm whether it can be configured this way.

The background is that Our S4 Public Cloud 3SL customer prefers to use the Classic Advanced Foreign Exchange Evaluation approach, while the implementation partner has activated 4G, which requires the advanced configuration, therefore our partner appreciate this can be the workaround to meet both requirements.

entry.title: Manage Incoming Payment Files will not import valid records
entry.content: When importing BAI files using Manage Incoming Payment Files, sap will reject the entire file when one entry (account number) is not present in bank account management.  Why can't the system import the valid records and include the invalid records in an error log.  This all or nothing approach is not user friendly and it would take considerable effort to have our banks adjust which records they send in our consolidated BAI files.

entry.title: Certifications not visible on " my certifications " on learning.sap
entry.content:
My valid certifications are not visible under " my certifications" on learning.sap. I checked some similar existing queries and also raised a query with support. They have verified that my universal id is correctly set up and also the email attached to my profile is correct and they are able to see that I have certifications. 

But they also said that "my certifications" tab is experiencing some technical issue so it is not visible on my end. And then they closed the ticket. Can someone please let me know if they are also facing similar issues. It has been quite a few days I am not able to see the certifications and also I don't understand, if I cant access it how can I renew it?

Appreciate any feedback and response

Thanks

entry.title: Customer on account payments Scope item 1S0 - SAP Digital Payments
entry.content:
Dear Team,

Customer has a requirement where the sales rep would intend to process customer on-account card payments and match it against open invoices on the same payment processing screen. 

We are using SAP Digital payments add-on solution and was exploring scope item 1S0-Customer payments (specifically apps "Make Ad-hoc Payment" and "Pay my Bills") to meet above functionality.

However, the above scope item 1S0 has been deprecated in 2508 and will be reinstated back in 2602. SAP alternatively has planned to make APIs available on 18th Sep using which customers can build their own payment portal.

Customer is reluctant to build any custom portal as they are subscribed to a standard DPA solution which defeats the purpose if we go for an interim custom payment portal solution for few months.

The other alternate solution that we have communicated to the customer is to use PSP dashboard offline to make such payments but again the matching of payments to invoices will not be automated here and it create 2 diverse process (order payments and on-accounts payments) for sales rep to follow which is not acceptable for the customer.

Can you please suggest if any of you are in a similar situation and if any other alternatives are being explored at your end to mitigate & address above requirement ?

Thanks!

Regards,

Kunal

entry.title: How to approve/reject tasks directly in SAP Mobile Start app (s/4hana cloud public edition)
entry.content:
Hello,

We have integrated SAP S/4HANA Cloud with SAP Mobile Start through SAP Build Work Zone.
The purchaser and purchasing manager roles have been exposed to BTP and assigned in Build Work Zone.

After completing all notification-related configurations, we are able to receive purchase requisition approval tasks both on the mobile device and on the Build Work Zone home page.

However, to actually approve or reject a task, we still need to navigate to the tenant and process it there.

Is there a way to handle these approval/rejection actions directly from the SAP Mobile Start app without navigating to the tenant?

Thanks in advance for your guidance.

entry.title: in S/4hana cloud public logistic context, add custom field to batch
entry.content:
Hello,

I seems from the documentation that it is not possible. but I wanted to confirme here.

In a logistics context with a MES we would need to add a custom field on the Batch object and expose in an API.
for now we would use the scenarion SAP_COM_0337 but we might create a custom one if needed.
is it possible with key user extension to add a custom field to a batch?
do we need to go with java SDK abap?
or is it just not possible?

thanks for you help

regards

entry.title: S/4HANA Cloud Communication Management Translations
entry.content:
Hi folks,

I created several technical objects within the public cloud and need to translate them. 

  • Communication scenario
  • Inbound service
  • outbound service

Some Fiori apps e.g. Display communication Scenario can not show entries when translations for the regarding browser language are missing.

Already tried to use the app "Manage Translations" but it does not allow to add the above objects,

Any ideas?

Thanks.

entry.title: SAP Public Cloud 2508 / Error when using the new App "Import Master Data - Business Partners"
entry.content:
Hello Experts,
i wanted to utilize the new Apps "Export Master Data - Business Partners (New)" (F6551A) and "Import Master Data - Business Partners (New)" (F6553A).
What i did was, i selected a Business Partner with all tables exported it as an XML and then unlocked the file in Exel so it could be edited. I then tried to just import it into another tenant without a source system, but during the creation of this Import process, the process gets stuck on the status "Importing file" . Also the file i uploaded starts to flicker, so it disappears for a second in the ui and then appears again and this goes on for ever. 

So my question is, is this error/bug specific to our system or did i miss some important step in the process of exporting and importing ?

Best regards 
Lukas

entry.title: Custom Logic S/4 Hana Public Cloud
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

I am developing some custom logic. My goal is to have the system send a payload to a specific endpoint in our in-house system whenever a Process Order is technically completed.

The payload should contain the following:

  • Process Order: {Number}

  • Status: {Completed}

Could anyone help me with this?

Thanks and best regards,

entry.title: Duplicated invoice posting issues for ERS job
entry.content:
Dear SAP Support,

We"ve met duplicated invoice posting issues for ERS job.

Background: When we create Purchase order, post goods issue, we use ERS function, schedule supplier invoice job, to create the invoice every day. Normally, once the invoice was posted for the goods receipt document, at the next day, it won"t create the invoice again.

Problem: We have purchase order 4500004906, the goods receipt document 500000263 was reversed by 500000264 on the same day before ERS job run.

When run ERS job, it created a supplier invoice job with amount 0.

The problem is that system created the supplier invoice with amount 0 every day for the same goods receipt document 500000263 and 500000264.

Questions:

Why system can create the supplier invoice many times for the same goods receipt document (with its reversal document)?

Why ERS job can create the supplier invoice job with amount 0? (When use APP "Create supplier invoice, it cannot post the invoice with amount 0).

Temporary solution:

There are many reversal GR documents like above example, we cancelled the job, and rescheduled it, changed the goods receipt posting date from Sep.12, then the problem is solved.

Questions: How can we avoid such duplicated posting issues in future?

Thank you.

Best Regards,

Grace

entry.title: Export of CDS View generates two lines for one Product
entry.content:
We are using a CDS View for Material Master Data.

This CDS View generates the following layout:

 

 

The issue here is, once we download the Export of this CDS View we receive two lines  for one material: line 1 with english description, line 2 with german description:

 

 

Can this be prevented so that we receive just one line (whether in english or in german)?

Best regards,

Kerisha
